originalText.text: We recently bought an apartment in a new building and hired Flo Restoration to handle the customization of the space.  His work is great, his crew is professional and the project was finished on time. Flo listened to my requirements and had great ideas on how to achieve them. I would highly recommend Flo Restorations to anyone.

originalText.text:
Great quality, professional, on the mark. Flo Restoration is perfect for any type of home improvement you'll ever need.

I recently had my apartment completely re-done in Downtown, NY. Since i go to school near by, I needed the re-do to be done quickly.

Flo arrived with his team and go to work. My apartment was ready in time and fully clean.

I highly recommend Flo and his team. You cant go wrong with them.

originalText.text: I called Flo Restoration for a bathroom renovation project and their services were fast. Highly punctual and helpful company. The work was fantastic. Highly recommended for excellent quality.

text.text: I called Flo Restoration for a bathroom renovation project and their services were fast. Highly punctual and helpful company. The work was fantastic. Highly recommended for excellent quality.

originalText.text: We recently completed a total renovation of a 3-bedroom apartment on the Upper East Side. Flo and their team were amazing. From start to finish, their competence, attention to detail and professionalism were extraordinary. Flo Restoration Inc  was totally accommodating and extremely helpful in implementing the design we sought to achieve. Their ability to handle surprises was truly impressive. The advice they gave along the way was priceless. We can honestly say that we truly enjoyed the process and look forward to another project with Flo Restoration in the future.

originalText.text: I hired Flo And his team to remodel our kitchen.  I wasn't sure exactly what I was looking for and so I wanted to work with an experienced contractor who could give me idea's.  Flo had a ton of idea's on what to do, the price was reasonable, and the work was fantastic!  They finished right on-time and on budget!  I have heard horror stories from friends working with other contractors and I feel very lucky to have found these guys.  I can't wait for them to do my bathroom :)  Highly recommended!
